author: Thoughty2
description: The Pied Piper of Hamelin isn’t just a fairy tale — it’s rooted in a real historical mystery. In 1284, the children of Hamelin vanished, leaving behind only cryptic records and haunting clues carved into the town’s walls and glass. Centuries later, historians still debate what really happened — plague, migration, or something darker? This is the chilling truth behind one of history’s most unsettling legends.
title: The Real Tragedy Behind the Pied Piper of Hamelin
